    • Constructor Detail

      • SVTData

        public SVTData(int hybridNumber,
               int apvNumber,
               int channelNumber,
               int fpgaAddress,
               short[] adc)
        Creates an SVT data packet from
        Parameters:
        hybridNumber - Hybrid number (0-3)
        apvNumber - APV25 chip number (0-4)
        channelNumber - Sensor strip number (0-127)
        fpgaAddress - FPGA address
        adc - ADC samples obtained by sampling the shaper output. Currently, six samples are obtained per raw hit.

      • SVTData

        public SVTData(int[] data)
        Creates and SVT data packet from existing SVT data
        Parameters:
        data - The packed data as int array of size 4

    • Method Detail

        public int getSample(int n)
        Get the nth SVT sample
        Parameters:
        n - The sample number of interest. Valid values are 0 to 5
        Returns:
        ADC value of the nth sample
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the sample number is out of range
